逸事.definition: anecdote; lost or apocryphal story about famous person

逸事遺聞.definition: variant of 軼事遺聞|轶事遗闻[yi4 shi4 yi2 wen2]

逸塵.definition: outstanding; above the common; out of the ordinary

逸塵斷鞅.definition: lit. kicking up the dust and breaking the harness; fig. to ride like the wind (idiom)

逸散.definition: (of gas, liquid, toxins, heat etc) to escape; to dissipate

逸群.definition: above the common; outstanding; excelling; preeminent

逸聞.definition: variant of 軼聞|轶闻[yi4 wen2]

逸話.definition: rumor; anecdote (not in the official record); apocryphal story
